Marketing.title: Open-Source Experiment Tests Crypto with Dart-Throwing Monkey
Marketing.subtitle: Join the Journey: Building an Open-Source Next.js 13 Web App Together
Marketing.features-description: This project is an experiment to see how a modern app, with features like auth, subscriptions, API routes, and static pages would work in Next.js 13 app dir.

features-descriptions.nextjs: App dir, Routing, Layouts, Loading UI and API routes.
features-descriptions.react: Server and Client Components. Use hook.
features-descriptions.database: ORM using Prisma and deployed on PlanetScale.
features-descriptions.components: UI components built using Radix UI and styled with Tailwind CSS.
features-descriptions.subscription: Free and paid subscriptions using LemonSqueezy.

Marketing.open-source-description:
